Key Match Events: Finney-Smith hit a 3-pointer and Schroder drove past Edey and made a layup to make it 106-101 with 32 seconds remaining.
Jackson answered on the other end with a 3-pointer and the Grizzlies had a chance to win but Santi Aldama missed a 3 as time expired.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nets evened its record at 4-4.
The Grizzlies had won their last two games.
The game was played at Barclays Center, which the Nets had not played at since the 2021-22 season.
The Grizzlies made just 8 of the 30 attempts beyond the 3-point line.
Others: Zach Edey had season highs of 25 points and 11 rebounds for the Grizzlies.
Cam Johnson had his second consecutive game with at least 20 points â€“ the third time he has done since coming to Brooklyn in the Kevin Durant trade.
